def.dt: :a person who is in charge of a ship or an airplane The captain has turned off the “fasten seat belt” sign. Captain Ahab
:an officer of high rank in some branches of the military an army/navy captain
:an officer of high rank in a police or fire department
:an athlete who is chosen to be the leader of a team She was the captain of our team. = She was our team captain.
:to be the captain of (something): such as
:to be in charge of (a ship or airplane) The ship was captained by John Smith.
:to lead (a team) She captained last year's team.
:someone who owns or manages a large, successful business or company
:the captain of a ship that travels on the sea
